trans-unit.source:
Provides a simple link to the Install Tool. Notice the Install Tool (in typo3/install/) must be enabled.
Access for 'admin' users only!
trans-unit.target:
提供捷徑到安裝工具。留意安裝工具（在typo3/install中）一定要被啟動，
只供「系統管理員」使用者存取！

trans-unit.source:
For security reasons the Install Tool is locked by default.

To unlock the Install Tool, an empty file with the name ENABLE_INSTALL_TOOL must be created in typo3conf/.

By hitting the button below, this file is created for you and the Install Tool will be unlocked.

You are recommended to log out from the Install Tool after finishing your work. Otherwise TYPO3 will automatically lock the Install Tool after one hour.
